title: Cap'n Crunch font?
content: Anyone have a clue as to what the Cap'n Crunch font is?
author: tullfan

comments.content:
I think it's similar to one of the Century family of typefaces, such as [Century 731 (Textype)](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417002322/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/century-731/bold/testdrive.html?s=CAP%27N+CRUNCH&p=48). You would have to probably add some thickness, and the outlining and then bounce the letters, but I think that could simulate the lettering pretty well.  
- Mike Yanega
